remarks: Double restricted existential uniqueness in terms of restricted existence and restricted "at most one."  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2017.)
statement: 2reu5a $p |- ( E! x e. A E! y e. B ph <-> ( E. x e. A ( E. y e. B ph /\ E* y e. B ph ) /\ E* x e. A ( E. y e. B ph /\ E* y e. B ph ) ) ) $.
